Here's a related question...   Any way to get cookie information for a
 par=
ticular URI when tracking the progress of a crawl on the fly
through the Cr=
awlURIDispositionListener API?

--- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, "bl=
ah_1977" <hwangs@...> wrote:
>
> Thanks for the pointer to ExtractorTool, b=
ut it looks like a post
> process that operates on the ARC file written dur=
ing a crawl.  Does
> anybody know how to get grandparent URI information on=
 the fly DURING
> the crawl and WITHOUT having to rely on an ARC file?
> 
>=
 --- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, Mathew Nik Foscarini
> <nfoscarini=
@> wrote:
> >
> > Thank you! 
> > 
> > I've been trying to figure out how t=
o get the parent URL, and I
> somehow missed the getVia() method.
> > 
> > =
It's possible to get the grandparent URLs as a post process after
> the job=
 has completed. I think the
> org.archive.crawler.extractor.ExtractorTool p=
rogram does this. It
> generates a report of referring URls found during a =
crawl.
> > 
> > Have a look at the source code.
> > 
> > --
